description: Update a project bid location material type.
permissions: Allowed when the user can create on the associated project bid location (ProjectBidLocation policy); update permission mirrors create?.
side_effects: Updates attributes and/or relationships on a project bid location material type record.
validation_notes: At least one updatable field must be provided. If --material-type is provided, it must be non-empty. --unit-of-measure may be set to an empty string to clear the unit of measure. material_type_id must be unique within the same project_bid_location_id. quantity must be a number greater than or equal to 0 when provided. project bid location cannot be changed after creation.

flags.name: --unit-of-measure
flags.validation: Use empty string to clear the unit of measure.

flags.name: --quantity
flags.validation: Must be a number greater than or equal to 0 when provided.
